activities:
Free & Clear, Inc. is a leading preventative care company focused on providing tobacco cessation and lifestyle wellness programs to employers, state governments and health plans.  The company specializes in pone-based and online learning supported by cognitive behavioral coaching to help employers improve the overall health and productivity of their workforces.  Free & Clear's clients may have employees who reside in the EU.
Information received from participants in the EUmay include both health realted information and personal information such as a participant's history of tobacco use, weight, height, current health conditions, name, employee identification number (which may be an employee's social security number), address, email, and phone number. 
Information is collected from participants through telephone-based cognitive behavioral coaschin sesions, and via Free & Clear web sites for some participants.  The data that Free & Clear collects from participants in the EU is stored on servers in the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
